thread.title: Equity Analytics Data Developer at Open Systems Technologies (New York City, NY)
thread.title_full: Equity Analytics Data Developer at Open Systems Technologies (New York City, NY)

title: Equity Analytics Data Developer at Open Systems Technologies (New York City, NY)
text: Source: BullhornReach.com The team is responsible for building infrastructure that houses its own data and retrieves data from multiple sources. We also provide analytics on top of this data as well provide tools to analyze transactions as well as measure performance. The code base for this is recently developed and leverages reusable code written entirely in C++. The R&D Team is looking for a software consultant who will join our fast paced team to work within a start-up like environment within a large firm. Qualifications: 3+ years of hands-on professional experience in software development Strong and extensive C++/UNIX development skills Computer Science fundamentals and demonstrated experience in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis Strong problem solving, communication skills and enjoys collaborative environment
